oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util

Class SpatialUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.util.SpatialUtils

  • public class SpatialUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides convenience spatial operations used internally by the API components.

    Author:
    hsaucedo

      • anyInteract

        public static boolean anyInteract(JGeometry g1,
                                  JGeometry g2,
                                  java.lang.Boolean geodetic,
                                  java.lang.Double tolerance)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs an anyInteract test between two geometries
        Parameters:
        g1 - a JGeometry instance
        g2 - a JGeometry instance
        geodetic - whether the geometries are geodetic or not
        tolerance - the tolerance used
        Returns:
        true if the geometries interact
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isInside

        public static boolean isInside(JGeometry g1,
                               JGeometry g2,
                               java.lang.Boolean geodetic,
                               java.lang.Double tolerance)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs an isInside test between two geometry
        Parameters:
        g1 - the geometry which is tested to be within the other
        g2 - the geometry which may contain the first geometry
        geodetic - whether the geometries are geodetic or not
        tolerance - the tolerance used
        Returns:
        true if g1 is whithin g2
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • performFilter

        public static boolean performFilter(JGeometry geom,
                                    SpatialOperationConfig spatialOpConf)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs the spatial operation described by the SpatialOperationConfig parameter.
        Parameters:
        geom - a JGeometry instance that will be used as operand in the spatal filter
        spatialOpConf - a SpatialOperationConfig which describes the operation to perform
        Returns:
        true if the spatial operation succeeded
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
